doc.title: Perceived performance

value.content: Perceived performance is a measure of how fast, responsive, and reliable a website feels to its users. The perception of how well a site is performing can have more impact on the user experience than the actual load and response times.

doc.summary: Perceived performance is a measure of how fast, responsive, and reliable a website feels to its users. The perception of how well a site is performing can have more impact on the user experience than the actual load and response times.
